summary: An ingratiating bride develops warm ties to her father-in-law while her cold husband blithely slights her for another woman.
cast: Setsuko Hara|Sô Yamamura|Ken Uehara|Yôko Sugi|Teruko Nagaoka|Yatsuko Tan'ami|Chieko Nakakita|Rieko Sumi|Hisao Toake|Machiko Kitagawa|Fumiko Saito|Tsuruko Mano|Nobuo Kaneko
keywords: marriage|husband wife relationship|kamakura japan|father in law daughter in law relationship|unwanted pregnancy
title: La voz de la montaña
